\chapter{Manual}
\label{\detokenize{install:manual}}\label{\detokenize{install::doc}}

\section{Requirements}
\label{\detokenize{install:requirements}}\begin{description}
\item[{To make use of ermtk you have to install python3 and the following modules for python3:}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
cmd2

\item {} 
lxml

\item {} 
BaseXClient

\item {} 
cx\_Oracle

\item {} 
keyboard

\item {} 
psycopg2

\item {} 
mysql

\item {} 
mysqlclient

\item {} 
mysql-connector

\item {} 
pyodbc

\item {} 
networkx

\item {} 
graphviz

\item {} 
faker

\item {} 
tkinter

\item {} 
pygraphviz

\end{itemize}

\end{description}

This modules can be installed by running the install.sh skript(located in the Ermtk directory).
\newpage

\section{Installation}
\label{\detokenize{install:installation}}\begin{quote}
\begin{enumerate}
\def\theenumi{\arabic{enumi}}
\def\labelenumi{\theenumi .}
\makeatletter\def\p@enumii{\p@enumi \theenumi .}\makeatother
\item {} 
Clone the Repository to a Path your choice.

\item {} 
Now go to the Ermtk folder and copy the path to the ermtk.py file.

\item {} 
Next go to /home/bin (if you don’t have this directory, you have to create it and add the path to the PATH variable)

\item {} 
Run this command: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ln -s {[}path to ermtk.py{]} ermtk}}

\end{enumerate}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Info: Type \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ermtk help}} for help

\item {} 
Example: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ln -s \textasciitilde{}/Ermtk/ermtk.py ermtk}}

\end{itemize}
\end{quote}


\chapter{Commands and Sub-commands}

             \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}\PYG{n}{erdgenerate}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n+nb}{open}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{close}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{exit}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{shell}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{bye}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n+nb}{list}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{erdfocus}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{blockdiagram}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{ddlgenerate}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{dmlgenerate}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{dmlform}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{config}\PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}

\section{Named Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Named Arguments}}\label{\detokenize{cmd_main::doc}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [-v, -{-}version]  
show program’s version number and exit
\end{optionlist}


\section{sub-commands}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:sub-commands}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [subparser]  
Possible choices: erdgenerate, open, close, exit, shell, bye, list, erdfocus, blockdiagram, ddlgenerate, dmlgenerate, dmlform, config

sub-command help
\end{optionlist}


\section{Sub-commands:}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Sub-commands:}}

\subsection{erdgenerate}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:erdgenerate}}
Generate an ERD from XERML Modell

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{erdgenerate} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{h}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{i} \PYG{n}{INPUTFILE}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{o} \PYG{n}{OUTPUT}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{n} \PYG{n}{NOTATION}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{t} \PYG{n}{TYP}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{a}\PYG{p}{]}
                  \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{c}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{g}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{p}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{d}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{v}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{l} \PYG{n}{LOC}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{s}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{auto}\PYG{p}{]}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsubsection{Named Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Named Arguments_repeat1}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [-i, -{-}inputfile]  
Inputfile
\item [-o, -{-}output]  
Outputfile
\item [-n, -{-}notation]  
Takes a value to define the notation
Example: \textendash{}notation crowfoot
\item [-t, -{-}typ]  
Attributes with types are displayed in the ERD
\item [-a, -{-}attr]  
The ERD displays Attributes
\item [-c, -{-}color]  
The ERD is colored
\item [-g, -{-}graphml]  
The Output-Type is a GraphML File
\item [-p, -{-}pic]  
The Output-Type is a Pic-File
\item [-d, -{-}draw]  
The Output-Type is a LibreOffice Draw File
\item [-v, -{-}viz]  
The Output-Type is a Graphviz File
\item [-l, -{-}loc]  
Define the output language
\item [-s, -{-}show]  
Shows generated Diagramm in Programm
\item [-{-}auto]  
ERD generated with default options
\end{optionlist}

\subsubsection{Examples}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{erdgenerate}  \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{i} \PYG{n}{sis.xerml.xml}  \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{o} \PYG{n}{sis.graphml} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{p} 
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{erdgenerate}  \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{i} \PYG{n}{sis.xerml.xml}  \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{o} \PYG{n}{sis.graphml} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{n} \PYG{n}{crowfoot} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{g} 
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\subsection{open}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:open}}
Opens a XERML-File to use it in the Shell

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n+nb}{open} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{h}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{i} \PYG{n}{INPUTFILE}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{l} \PYG{n}{LANGUAGE}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{t} \PYG{n}{TYPE}\PYG{p}{]}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsubsection{Named Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Named Arguments_repeat2}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [-i, -{-}inputfile]  
Inputfile
\item [-l, -{-}language]  
Laguagefile
\item [-t, -{-}type]  
Typefile
\end{optionlist}

\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\subsection{close}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:close}}
Closes a XERML-File if it is not needed anymore

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]

\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Named Arguments_repeat3}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}

Typefile
\item [-l, -{-}language]  
Languagefile
\end{optionlist}

\subsection{list}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:list}}
Generate an ERD from XERML Modell

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n+nb}{list} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{h}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n+nb}{all}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{ent}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{rel}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{attr}\PYG{p}{]}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsubsection{Named Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Named Arguments_repeat4}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [-all]  
List all Entity-Types and Relationship-Types
\item [-ent]  
List Entity-Types
\item [-rel]  
List Relationship-Types
\item [-attr]  
List Attributes
\end{optionlist}

\subsubsection{Examples}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{list}  \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{all} 
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n+nb}{list} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{ent} 
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\subsection{erdfocus}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:erdfocus}}
Generate an ERD focusing on specified Entities

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{erdfocus} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{h}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{i} \PYG{n}{INPUTFILE}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{o} \PYG{n}{OUTPUT}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{f} \PYG{n}{FILTER}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{r} \PYG{n}{RELCOUNTER}\PYG{p}{]}
               \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{n} \PYG{n}{NOTATION}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{t} \PYG{n}{TYP}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{a}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{c}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{g}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{p}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{d}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{v}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{l} \PYG{n}{LOC}\PYG{p}{]}
               \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{auto}\PYG{p}{]}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsubsection{Named Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Named Arguments_repeat5}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [-i, -{-}inputfile]  
Inputfile
\item [-o, -{-}output]  
Outputfile
\item [-f, -{-}filter]  
Takes a value to filter the ERD
\item [-r, -{-}relcounter]  
Takes a number to define how much you want to see.
\item [-n, -{-}notation]  
Takes a value to define the notation
Example: \textendash{}notation crowfoot
\item [-t, -{-}typ]  
Attributes with types are displayed in the ERD
\item [-a, -{-}attr]  
Attributes are displayed in the ERD
\item [-c, -{-}color]  
The ERD is colored
\item [-g, -{-}graphml]  
The Output-Type is a GraphML File
\item [-p, -{-}pic]  
The Output-Type is a Pic-File
\item [-d, -{-}draw]  
The Output-Type is a LibreOffice Draw File
\item [-v, -{-}viz]  
The Output-Type is a Graphviz File
\item [-l, -{-}loc]  
Define the output language
\item [-{-}auto]  
ERD generated with default options
\end{optionlist}

\subsubsection{Examples}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{erdfocus} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{i} \PYG{n}{sis.xerml.xml} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{f} \PYG{n}{"Klasse"} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{r} \PYG{n}{1}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\subsection{ddlgenerate}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:ddlgenerate}}
Convert an XERML Modell into DDL-Commands

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{ddlgenerate} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{h}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{i} \PYG{n}{INPUTFILE}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{o} \PYG{n}{OUTPUT}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{amount} \PYG{n}{AMOUNT}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{t} \PYG{n}{TYP}\PYG{p}{]}
                  \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{l} \PYG{n}{LOC}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{auto}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{alltables}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{notnull}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n+nb}{format}\PYG{p}{]}
                  \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{constaft}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{consttabl}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{keyword}\PYG{p}{]}
                  \PYG{n}{databasetype}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsubsection{Positional Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Positional Arguments}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [databasetype]  
Available Databasetype: basexml, basexschema, mysql, oracle, postgresql, rel, sqlserver, sqlite
\end{optionlist}


\subsubsection{Named Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Named Arguments_repeat7}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [-i, -{-}inputfile]  
Inputfile
\item [-o, -{-}output]  
Outputfile
\item [-{-}amount]  
Amount of XML data (only availible for BaseX)
\item [-t, -{-}typ]  
Typdescription
\item [-l, -{-}loc]  
Localisation
\item [-{-}auto]  
Automatically run against database
\item [-{-}alltables]  
All relation as tables
\item [-{-}notnull]  
Deactivates the not null
\item [-{-}format]  
Format for outputfile
\item [-{-}constaft]  
Constraints after create Tables
\item [-{-}consttabl]  
Constraints as Tableconstraints
\item [-{-}keyword]  
Keywords as uppercase
\end{optionlist}

\subsubsection{Examples}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{ddlgenerate} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{i} \PYG{n}{aaa.xerml.xml} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{o} \PYG{n}{aaa.basex.xml} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{amount} \PYG{n}{3} \PYG{n}{basexml}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{ddlgenerate} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{i} \PYG{n}{tank.xerml.xml} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{o} \PYG{n}{tank.mysql.sql} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{t} \PYG{n}{tank.xerml.ty.xml} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{auto}  \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{notnull} \PYG{n}{mysql}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\subsection{dmlgenerate}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:dmlgenerate}}
Generate example data in form of DML-Commands

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{dmlgenerate} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{h}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{i} \PYG{n}{INPUTFILE}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{o} \PYG{n}{OUTPUT}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{alltables}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{auto}\PYG{p}{]}
                  \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{t} \PYG{n}{TYP}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{l} \PYG{n}{LOC}\PYG{p}{]}
                  \PYG{n}{database} \PYG{n}{amount}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsubsection{Positional Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Positional Arguments_repeat1}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [database]  
Available Databases: baseX, mysql, oracle, postgresql, rel, sqlserver
\item [amount]  
Amount of Example Data
\end{optionlist}


\subsubsection{Named Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Named Arguments_repeat8}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [-i, -{-}inputfile]  
Inputfile
\item [-o, -{-}output]  
Outputfile
\item [-{-}alltables]  
All relations as tables
\item [-{-}auto]  
Automatically run against database
\item [-t, -{-}typ]  
Typdescription
\item [-l, -{-}loc]  
Localisation
\end{optionlist}

\subsubsection{Examples}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{dmlgenerate} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{i} \PYG{n}{mondial.xerml.xml} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{o} \PYG{n}{mondial.dml.sql} \PYG{n}{oracle} \PYG{n}{4}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{dmlgenerate} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{i} \PYG{n}{mondial.xerml.xml} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{o} \PYG{n}{mondial.dml.sql} \PYG{n}{sqlserver} \PYG{n}{4} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{alltables}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\subsection{dmlform}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:dmlform}}
Generate an entry form for typ in example data

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{dmlform} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{h}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{i} \PYG{n}{INPUTFILE}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{t} \PYG{n}{TYP}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{l} \PYG{n}{LOC}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{o} \PYG{n}{OUTPUT}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{alltables}\PYG{p}{]}
              \PYG{n}{database}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsubsection{Positional Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Positional Arguments_repeat2}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [database]  
Database
\end{optionlist}


\subsubsection{Named Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Named Arguments_repeat9}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [-i, -{-}inputfile]  
Inputfile
\item [-t, -{-}typ]  
Typdescription
\item [-l, -{-}loc]  
Localisation
\item [-o, -{-}output]  
Outputfile
\item [-{-}alltables]  
All relations as tables
\end{optionlist}

\subsubsection{Examples}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{dmlform} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{i} \PYG{n}{sf.xerml.xml} \PYG{n}{Rel}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\subsection{config}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:config}}
Configure database connection attributes

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{config} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{h}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{s}\PYG{p}{]}
             \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}\PYG{n}{basex}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{oracle}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{postgresql}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{sqlite}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{sqlserver}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{mysql}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{rel}\PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}} \PYG{o}{.}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{o}{.}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsubsection{Named Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Named Arguments_repeat10}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [-s, -{-}save]  
Save current configuration
\end{optionlist}


\subsubsection{config-commands}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:config-commands}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [subparser]  
Possible choices: basex, oracle, postgresql, sqlite, sqlserver, mysql, rel

config-command help
\end{optionlist}


\subsubsection{Sub-commands:}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Sub-commands:_repeat1}}

\paragraph{basex}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:basex}}
BaseX connection attributes

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{config} \PYG{n}{basex} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{h}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{a} \PYG{n}{ADDRESS}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{por} \PYG{n}{PORT}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{usr} \PYG{n}{USER}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{pwd} \PYG{n}{PASSWORD}\PYG{p}{]}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subparagraph{Named Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Named Arguments_repeat11}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [-a, -{-}address]  
Configure Address DEFAULT = Localhost
\item [-por, -{-}port]  
Configure Port DEFAULT = 1984
\item [-usr, -{-}user]  
Configure User DEFAULT = admin
\item [-pwd, -{-}password]  
Configure Password DEFAULT = admin
\end{optionlist}

\subsubsection{Examples}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{config} \PYG{n}{basex}  \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{a} \PYG{n}{192.168.0.3}\PYG{p} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{por} \PYG{n}{1133} 
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\paragraph{oracle}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:oracle}}
Oracle connection attributes

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{config} \PYG{n}{oracle} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{h}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{a} \PYG{n}{ADDRESS}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{s} \PYG{n}{SERVICENAME}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{usr} \PYG{n}{USER}\PYG{p}{]}
                    \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{pwd} \PYG{n}{PASSWORD}\PYG{p}{]}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subparagraph{Named Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Named Arguments_repeat12}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [-a, -{-}address]  
Configure Address DEFAULT = 127.0.0.1
\item [-s, -{-}servicename]  
Configure ServiceName DEFAULT = XE
\item [-usr, -{-}user]  
Configure User DEFAULT = i13075
\item [-pwd, -{-}password]  
Configure Password DEFAULT = topsecret
\end{optionlist}

\subsubsection{Examples}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{config} \PYG{n}{oracle}  \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{a} \PYG{n}{123.123.123.123} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{s} \PYG{n}{XE} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{usr} \PYG{n}{admin} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{pwd} \PYG{n}{topsecret}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\subparagraph{Named Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Named Arguments_repeat13}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [-a, -{-}address]  
Configure Address DEFAULT = localhost
\item [-d, -{-}database]  
Configure Database DEFAULT = test
\item [-usr, -{-}user]  
Configure User DEFAULT = postgres
\item [-pwd, -{-}password]  
Configure Password DEFAULT = postgres
\end{optionlist}

\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\subparagraph{Named Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Named Arguments_repeat14}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [-d, -{-}directory]

\end{optionlist}

\paragraph{sqlserver}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:sqlserver}}
SQLServer connection attributes

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{config} \PYG{n}{sqlserver} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{h}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{dri} \PYG{n}{DRIVER}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{ser} \PYG{n}{SERVER}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{da} \PYG{n}{DATABASE}\PYG{p}{]}
                       \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{usr} \PYG{n}{USERID}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{pwd} \PYG{n}{PASSWORD}\PYG{p}{]}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subparagraph{Named Arguments}
\label{\detokenize{cmd_main:Named Arguments_repeat15}}\begin{optionlist}{3cm}
\item [-dri, -{-}driver]  
Configure Driver DEFAULT = ODBC Driver 17 for SQL Server
\item [-ser, -{-}server]  
Configure Server DEFAULT = localhost
\item [-da, -{-}database]  
Configure Database DEFAULT = mydatabase
\item [-usr, -{-}userid]  
Configure UserID DEFAULT = sa
\item [-pwd, -{-}password]  
Configure Password DEFAULT = xX94Hugo
\end{optionlist}

\subsubsection{Examples}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{ermtk} \PYG{n}{config} \PYG{n}{sqlserver} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{dri} \PYG{n}{ODBC Driver 17 for SQL Server}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
